alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 31 at 9:33PM EDT until April 01 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Ohio, Cuyahoga, Geauga, Ashtabula Inland, Summit, Portage, Trumbull, Stark and Mahoning Counties. In Pennsylvania, Southern Erie and Crawford Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 6 PM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Brief wind gusts to 45 mph are possible between 1 AM and 5 AM ahead of an approaching cold front. Thunderstorms in that window may produce locally higher gusts.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
